main event: Observers sighted an unidentified flying object low in the sky in Onchiota, New York on April 18, 1966, that appeared to loop, hover, and then move fast.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes,The object changed brilliance and color from red to green to white,Observers were seminary students at a local college,The object's flight path was erratic, going from east to south and rising overhead, Radar indicated an aircraft in the area which may have been misidentified as the UFO.
witness description: seminary students in their early twenties
